query.statement: SELECT PROJECTID, PROJECTNAME, PROJECTALIAS FROM UX_PROJECT WHERE 1=1 AND VALIDSTATE = 'Valid'
SELECT FILEID, FILENAME, FILEALIAS, FILETYPE, FILECHARSET, PROJECTID, DESCRIPTION, PARENTFILEID, USERID, STATE, OPTIONS FROM UX_PROJECTFILE WHERE 1=1 AND VALIDSTATE = 'Valid'

SELECT PROJECTID AS 'FILEID', PROJECTNAME AS 'FILENAME', PROJECTALIAS AS 'FILEALIAS', 'FOLDER' AS 'FILETYPE', NULL AS 'PROJECTID', NULL AS 'PARENTFILEID' FROM UX_PROJECT WHERE 1=1 AND VALIDSTATE = 'Valid' UNION ALL SELECT FILEID, FILENAME, FILEALIAS, FILETYPE, PROJECTID, PARENTFILEID FROM UX_PROJECTFILE WHERE 1=1 AND VALIDSTATE = 'Valid'
SELECT CODEID AS VALUE, CODENAME AS TEXT FROM SF_CODE WHERE 1=1 AND CODECLASSID ='DesignerFontfamily' AND VALIDSTATE = 'Valid'
SELECT DISTINCT CASE WHEN DESCRIPTION='' THEN QUERYID ELSE DESCRIPTION END AS "TEXT", QUERYID AS "VALUE", DESCRIPTION FROM SF_QUERY WHERE VALIDSTATE='Valid' ORDER BY TEXT ASC
SELECT DISTINCT CASE WHEN DESCRIPTION='' THEN QUERYID ELSE DESCRIPTION END AS "TEXT", QUERYID AS "VALUE", DESCRIPTION FROM SF_QUERY WHERE VALIDSTATE='Valid' ORDER BY TEXT ASC
SELECT DISTINCT VERSION AS "TEXT", VERSION AS "VALUE", QUERY_ID AS "QUERYID" FROM SF_QUERY WHERE VALIDSTATE='Valid' ORDER BY TEXT ASC
SELECT USERID AS "VALUE", USERNAME AS "TEXT" FROM SF_USER WHERE VALIDSTATE='Valid'
SELECT "USERID" AS "VALUE", "USERNAME" AS "TEXT" FROM "SF_USER" WHERE "VALIDSTATE"='Valid'
SELECT MESSAGEID, MESSAGENAME, DESCRIPTION, MESSAGECLASSID, LANGUAGETYPE FROM SF_MESSAGE WHERE VALIDSTATE='Valid' AND MESSAGECLASSID like 'SUX_%' AND LANGUAGETYPE = '$!{_TXNINFO.LANGUAGETYPE}'

SELECT DICTIONARYID, DICTIONARYCLASSID, DICTIONARYNAME, DESCRIPTION, LANGUAGETYPE FROM SF_DICTIONARY WHERE VALIDSTATE = 'Valid' AND DICTIONARYCLASSID like 'SUX_%' AND LANGUAGETYPE = '$!{_TXNINFO.LANGUAGETYPE}'
SELECT "DICTIONARYID", "DICTIONARYCLASSID", "DICTIONARYNAME", "DESCRIPTION", "DICTIONARYTYPE" FROM "SF_DICTIONARY" WHERE "VALIDSTATE" = 'Valid'
SELECT CODEID AS "VALUE", CODENAME AS "TEXT" FROM SF_CODE WHERE VALIDSTATE='Valid' AND CODECLASSID = 'LANGUAGETYPE' ORDER BY DISPLAYSEQUENCE ASC

SELECT C.STATE AS STATE, C.MENUID AS MENUID , CASE WHEN D.DICTIONARYNAME IS NULL THEN CASE WHEN C.MENUNAME IS NULL THEN C.MENUID ELSE C.MENUNAME END ELSE D.DICTIONARYNAME END MENUNAME , C.DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION, C.PARENTMENUID AS PARENTMENUID, C.MENUTYPE AS MENUTYPE , C.PROGRAMID AS PROGRAMID, C.OPTIONS AS OPTIONS , C.DICTIONARYID AS LCODE FROM ( SELECT A.STATE, A.MENUID, A.MENUNAME , A.DESCRIPTION, A.PARENTMENUID, A.MENUTYPE , A.PROGRAMID, A.OPTIONS, A.DICTIONARYID, A.DISPLAYSEQUENCE FROM SF_MENU A INNER JOIN ( SELECT A.MENUID FROM SF_MENUAUTHORITY A INNER JOIN ( SELECT USERCLASSID FROM SF_USERCLASSUSER WHERE USERID = '$!{_TXNINFO.USER}' AND VALIDSTATE = 'Valid' ) B ON A.USERCLASSID = B.USERCLASSID WHERE A.VALIDSTATE = 'Valid' GROUP BY A.MENUID ) B ON A.MENUID = B.MENUID WHERE 1=1 AND A.VALIDSTATE = 'Valid' AND A.UIID = '$!{_TXNINFO.UIID}' ) C LEFT OUTER JOIN SF_DICTIONARY D ON C.DICTIONARYID = D.DICTIONARYID AND D.LANGUAGETYPE = '$!{_TXNINFO.LANGUAGETYPE}' ORDER BY C.DISPLAYSEQUENCE, C.MENUTYPE, C.PARENTMENUID, C.MENUID

SELECT STATE, MENUID, MENUNAME, DESCRIPTION, PARENTMENUID, MENUTYPE, PROGRAMID, OPTIONS FROM SF_MENU WHERE MENUTYPE IN ( 'FOLDER', 'SCREEN', 'POPUP', 'LINK' ) AND VALIDSTATE='Valid' AND UIID=:UIID ORDER BY DISPLAYSEQUENCE, MENUTYPE, PARENTMENUID, MENUNAME ASC
SELECT PROGRAMID AS "VALUE", MENUNAME AS "TEXT" FROM SF_MENU WHERE VALIDSTATE='Valid' AND MENUTYPE IN ('SCREEN', 'POPUP', 'LINK')
SELECT (MAX(DISPLAYSEQUENCE) + 100) NEWSEQUENCE FROM SF_MENU WHERE UIID = '$!{_TXNINFO.UIID}' AND PARENTMENUID = :PARENTMENUID
SELECT QUERYID || '|' || VERSION AS "VALUE", CASE WHEN DESCRIPTION='' THEN QUERYID ELSE DESCRIPTION END AS "TEXT" FROM SF_QUERY WHERE VALIDSTATE = 'Valid'
SELECT QUERYID + '|' + VERSION AS "VALUE", CASE WHEN DESCRIPTION='' THEN QUERYID ELSE DESCRIPTION END AS "TEXT" FROM SF_QUERY WHERE VALIDSTATE = 'Valid'
SELECT * FROM SF_USER WHERE USERID = :USERID AND PASSWORD = :PASSWORD AND VALIDSTATE = 'Valid'
SELECT * FROM "SF_USER" WHERE "USERID" = :USERID AND "PASSWORD" = :PASSWORD AND "VALIDSTATE" = 'Valid'
SELECT SALT FROM SF_USER WHERE VALIDSTATE = 'Valid'
SELECT UIID AS "VALUE", CASE WHEN UINAME IS NULL OR UINAME = '' THEN UIID ELSE UINAME END AS "TEXT" FROM SF_UI WHERE VALIDSTATE = 'Valid'
SELECT "UIID" AS "VALUE", CASE WHEN "UINAME" IS NULL OR "UINAME" = '' THEN "UIID" ELSE "UINAME" END AS "TEXT" FROM "SF_UI" WHERE "VALIDSTATE" = 'Valid'
SELECT MENUID AS "VALUE", MENUNAME AS "TEXT" FROM SF_MENU
SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM SFLOTDEFECT WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE LOTID = :LOTID" ORDER BY HISTKEY DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
SELECT * FROM SFLOTHISTORY WHERE LOTID <> :LOTID AND GROUPHISTKEY=:GROUPHISTKEY AND SERVICENAME=:SERVICENAME
SELECT * FROM SFLOTHISTORY WHERE LOTID IN (:LOTID1,:LOTID2) AND GROUPHISTKEY=:GROUPHISTKEY AND SERVICENAME=:SERVICENAME

SELECT A.CODEID , CASE WHEN B.DICTIONARYNAME IS NULL THEN A.CODENAME ELSE B.DICTIONARYNAME END CODENAME FROM SF_CODE A LEFT OUTER JOIN SF_DICTIONARY B ON A.DICTIONARYID = B.DICTIONARYID AND B.VALIDSTATE = 'Valid' AND B.LANGUAGETYPE = '$!{_TXNINFO.LANGUAGETYPE}' WHERE A.CODECLASSID = 'LANGUAGETYPE' AND A.VALIDSTATE = 'Valid'
